Queries.InsertIntoBook: INSERT INTO book (book_id, num, ISBN, book_name, author, publisher, publication_date, introduction, cover_picture, price, subject_type, collection_type) VALUES ('{book_id}', '{num}', '{ISBN}', '{book_name}', '{author}', '{publisher}', '{publication_date}', '{introduction}', '{cover_picture}', '{price}', '{subject_type}', '{collection_type}')
